com.felix.webmaintenance

Class MaintenanceManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.felix.webmaintenance.MaintenanceManager

  • public class MaintenanceManager
extends java.lang.Object
    A class to maintain configuration of a web-server by a maintenance web server.
    Author:
    burkhardt.felix
